nodes.text: Playstation Portable or PSP is a handheld console made by Sony. The PSP uses Universal Media Disks to store Game data and Movies. The PSP uses a Memory Stick Pro duo to store Saves, Downloaded games and other miscellaneous data.
The handheld uses the PlayStation Network for online gaming and downloadable content delivery.
A Star Wars collector's edition of the PSP, which features an image of Darth Vader on the back of the unit, was announced at E3 2007 and went on sale on October 9th, 2007.
Star Wars Video Games on the PSP
